summary: Group of immigrant Haitian farm workers tries to fight off an evil Haitian voodoo priest who tries to kill them & use their body parts to make up a zombie army.
cast: Raymond St. Jacques|Theresa Merritt|Gina Gershon|Kirk Baily|Billy 'Sly' Williams|J. Grant Albrecht|Tony Todd|Valerie Hines-Williamson|Georgia Allen|John Lawhorn|Pierre Perea|L. Warren Young|Ernestine Mathis|William Gribble|Jim Wiggins|Peter Knowlton|Gloria Reuben
title: Voodoo Dawn
